documentation.title: SlideMenuParent Class [PHP]
documentation.metadescription: KoolSlideMenu is very Easy-to-Use PHP Slide Menu. Based on Semantic rendering, Advanced CSS together with natural Sliding effect, KoolSlideMenu is Super Fast in rendering, Highly Appearance-Customizable and Elegant Behaviors, all making it stand out to be Excellent Choice for your Site Navigation
documentation.metakeywords: php menu, php slidemenu,php slide menu, ajax menu, php ajax menu,sliding menu, vertical menu

property.name: id
property.shortdesc: Get or set id of slidemenu parent
property.longdesc: Get or set id of slidemenu parent

property.name: text
property.shortdesc: Get or set text of slidemenu parent
property.longdesc: Get or set text of slidemenu parent
property.samplecode: <?php $parent = new SlideMenuParent("parent"); $parent->text = "This is parent";//Set the text content ?>

property.name: link
property.shortdesc: Get or set link of slidemenu parent.
property.longdesc: Get or set link of slidemenu parent.
property.samplecode:
<?php
	$parent = new SlideMenuParent("parent");
	$parent->link = "parentpage.php";
	//The browser will go to "parentpage.php" when the parent is clicked
?>

property.name: target
property.shortdesc: Get or set target of slidemenu parent link.
property.longdesc: Get or set target of slidemenu parent link.
property.samplecode:
<?php
	$parent = new SlideMenuParent("parent");
	$parent->link = "parentpage.php";
	$parent->target = "_blank";
	//The browser will go to "parentpage.php" on blank page when the parent is clicked
?>

property.name: expand
property.shortdesc: Get or set whether slidemenu parent expand initially
property.longdesc: Get or set whether slidemenu parent expand initially
property.samplecode: <?php $parent = new SlideMenuParent("parent"); $parent->expand = false;//Make the parent expand ?>

method.name: addChild
method.shortdesc: Add child/panel/subparent object as a child to the parent
method.longdesc: Add child/panel/subparent object as a child to the parent
method.samplecode:
<?php
	$parent = new SlideMenuParent("parent");
	$parent->addChild(new SlideMenuParent("subparent"));
	//Add a sub parent
	$parent->addChild(new SlideMenuChild("child"));
	//Add a slidemenu child
	$parent->addChild(new SlideMenuPanel("panel"));
	//Add a slidemenu panel 
?>
